definition: antiphon (i.e. solo voice answered by chorus)/sung reply (in agreement with first voice)/to reply with a poem in the same rhythm
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"

sentences.english: When there are two people, they can harmonize.
sentences.chinese: 对了，只要有两个人，就可以唱和音。

sentences.english: Work term, often sing with the yellow rose.
Unifying the singing-to-reply and presenting-answer functions as one, his poems had the function of letters concurrently.
sentences.chinese: 同时，其将唱和与赠答功能合一，兼有书信作用。

sentences.english: We need to sing with . sL .
sentences.chinese: 我们需要与万籁的萧声彼此唱和。

sentences.english: And will sing as bait, fishing line may edge of life.
sentences.chinese: 且将唱和为香饵，钓得今生网上缘。

sentences.english: I think she sings and writes really well.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得她唱和些歌都很不错。

sentences.english: Much of Close Friends in the Royal Court by Yu Xinzhong is poems with drawings.
sentences.chinese: 于兴宗“朝中知友”的唱和诗大部分都属于题画诗。

sentences.english: Life bubbles and sparkles. I can sing and dance, so happy that I can live.
sentences.chinese: 我能唱和跳舞，如此快乐以致我能活着，想象。

sentences.english: In the Stowe there is a long responsory, apparently not variable.
sentences.chinese: 在斯托还有很长的唱和，显然不变量。

sentences.english: "Responsory" between the poets is the typical form in poetry transmission.
sentences.chinese: 诗人之间的“唱和”，是人际诗歌传播的典型形式。

sentences.english: It is a style of poem applied by the poets in Sung Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 是宋代文人相互唱和的一种诗体。

sentences.english: You know I'm hoping you'll sing alone.
sentences.chinese: 你知道我多想和你一起唱和。

sentences.english: Changhe poems(poem of writing and replying) are a particular category of the Chinese ancient poems.
sentences.chinese: 唱和诗是中国古典诗歌的一个特殊的类别。

sentences.english: His with meaning responsory a kind of be politician poet logical choice.
sentences.chinese: 他的以意唱和正是政治家诗人的一种合乎逻辑的选择。

definition: to respond to a poem with a poem
to chant/to recite rhythmically/to polish verse
qin and se, two string instruments that play in perfect harmony/marital harmony
to do sth to one's heart's content
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
to read aloud/to recite rhythmically/to chant/to intone (esp. poems in rhythm)
